text: @borzou My wife has COPD, Asthma, and Sarcadosis. She is on oxygen 24/7 and she wears a mask when she goes out.  We don’t like the mask but the consequences of not wearing the mask and her getting COVID-19 are out weighed by her desire to live.  She will die if she gets this.
